column2: Really, this country’s existence was only a brief respite. All things must end.
There’s no use hanging on to hope now. Countries come and go, and it’s time to end some formal diplomatic relationships.\n\n§B(End diplomatic relationships involving non-existing countries.)§!
The Diplomatic World No Longer Recognises $COUNTRY$
It’s over. Embassies all over the world no longer recognise our government and all our formal diplomatic ties have been severed.

column4: Soulouque erklärt sich selbst zum Kaiser

column2: Faustin Soulouque, the compromise candidate for President in 1847, declared himself the second emperor of Haiti as Faustin I.
column3: Faustin Soulouque, candidat compromis à la présidentielle de 1847, s'est proclamé second empereur d'Haïti sous le nom de Faustin Ier.
column4: Der 1847 zum Präsidenten gewählte General Faustin Soulouque hat sich selbst zum Kaiser Faustin I. von Haiti gekrönt.
column6: Faustin Élie Soulouque, candidato de compromiso a presidente en 1847, se ha declarado a sí mismo segundo emperador de Haití como Faustino I.

column2: Our country has recently called upon all her allies to join our ongoing wars.
